channel.title: Media/Live-Action/Trailer Work for Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hey everyone
My name is Gage, and I am a film writer, director, producer, editor, and VFX Artist. I create game trailers, official live-action game promos, and movies. I run Lotims Inc., a multi-media company that makes award winning short films, official video game trailers, and officially licensed live-action video game promos/films.
I have been doing substantial work for a lot of mods lately in the trailer/media department, amongst them are [url='https://www.falloutlonestar.com']Fallout: Lonestar[/url], [url='https://www.falloutthefrontier.com']Fallout: The Frontier[/url], and [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adrcJpyGUJk']Fallout: Dust[/url]. As well as working with indie game developers from around the world, including creating the official trailers for [url='https://www.scpcbgame.com']SCP: Containment Breach[/url].
I've been playing Black Mesa for a while now, and wanted to inquire and offer my abilities to the Black Mesa team for any media related projects!
My work: [url='https://www.gageallen.com/']www.gageallen.com[/url] My Reel: [url]https://vimeo.com/122935344[/url] My Company work: [url='https://www.lotims.net/']www.lotims.net[/url]
Some of the trailers I've done: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpmE5Wy7YMU']SCP: Containment Breach Trailer 1[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HYXzA_UQpp0']SCP: Containment Breach Trailer 2[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tOBNFWgK_2o']Uncanny Valley 101 Trailer[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adrcJpyGUJk']Fallout: Dust - Official Trailer[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=801udOUwmKA']Fallout: Lonestar - Developer Diary 1[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KQEKost7bwc']Containment Breach: Run - Featurette[/url] [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ibMX0pDjVYI']Containment Breach: Run - Teaser[/url]
Most of my stuff has become pretty well known, ranging from 100,000 views to over 500,000 views.
I'd love to contribute what I could to the mod team. I'd also love to get the community's opinion on my stuff too!
Thanks again and keep up the incredible work guys. The game is fantastic
